job-1.title: Senior Web Designer
job-1.description: Responsible for design and development of ad banners, e-mail campaigns, websites, game launchers, landing pages, teaser sites, video trailers, branding, and logo builds. Lead team's production efficiency and acceleration with the reinforcement and management of custom built templates for several design related tasks.

job-2.title: Senior Web Designer/Developer
job-2.description: Worked as part of both the design and development teams to put together animated banner ads, email campaigns, responsive landing pages, and responsive game websites. Pioneered the design and development of multi-team templates and guideline documents for faster design and easier front end implementation of various game sites.

job-3.title: UI Developer
job-3.description: Established processes and communication practices between design, development teams and clients during every phase of the project to ensure smooth and efficient implementation. Developed web tools to enhance the company's website builder to work more efficiently on mobile devices.

job-4.title: Senior UI Developer
job-4.description: Developing and maintaining several marketing product websites for Apple's WWDC launch events. Implementing internal web tools that accelerate the production process between dev and design teams. Worked on the development of a site map generator for the design team to save countless hours of manual labor that also improves designer/client communication.
